website_summaries.verdict: You may not enjoy cleaning this sandwich maker, but you will like its ability to make multiple breakfast foods including custom sandwiches.
pros: Has 4 removable nonstick cook plates for making different types of foods, including waffles and sandwich plates
Easy to store, thanks to the trim design that saves space and cord-wrap component that keeps the cord neatly in place
cons: While the plates are removable and dishwasher safe, food tends to overflow onto non-submersible unit making cleaning a chore

customer_reviews.title: How many people does it take to clean a waffle maker?
customer_reviews.text: This product made great waffles, but the cleanup was monstrous! There are gaps between the plates and the plastic base. It really needs a bottom opening to be able to get everything that oozes out under it clean, OR a better design that allows venting out the back of the machine rather than around the waffle. To clean this item requires a full disassembly. I decided that it was not worth it, and this item is going in the garbage. I consider it money paid for a lesson learned. Unless you love taking things apart and reassembling, I would not suggest you purchase this item. If you like to tinker, however, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stars for this maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife when our old sandwich maker wore out. At first I thought I made a good decision, then we used it. It made the sandwiches fine but cleanup is not as advertised. The cheese ran off the side of the plate and into the inside of the unit. I had to take the unit apart ( it is not sealed like my old one). We then tried to make waffles. It made great waffles but we had some mix that ran down inside again. I've spent more time cleaning than I have eating. Trashed it and went to Walmart and bought another brand that works.
customer_reviews.author: linda culver

customer_reviews.title: It makes waffles
customer_reviews.text: It's ok as cheap waffle makers go. Heat recovery time is a little slow, but the results come out ok. Plates are thin cheap aluminum coated in black non-stick. They don't hold a lot of heat to help keep temperature steady when you pour cold batter on them. Low stars because of impossibility of cleanup. The removable plates leave lots of gaps for waffle batter to drip into. It's not possible to completely clean this without removing several screws that weren't intended to be removed. You have to take it completely apart exposing interior wiring to remove chunks of batter that dripped inside, then cooked there from the reflected heat inside.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S. Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Works well but melted cheese oozes UNDER the hot plates and is terrible to clean up
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good little machine. Word of warning - whilst the plates are easy to clean the body of it is not! If you use cheese in it - and let's face it, that why we like toasted sandwiches! - the cheese can get under the plates easily and into the body of the machine. It's a bit of a pain to clean then. Time consuming and very finicky. If not for that aspect, it would have received a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: Defective Piece of Junk from China
customer_reviews.text: The waffle plates don't even fit the device so it's impossible to attach them to the unit. Also, the instructions were horrible, obviously written by someone from China who barely speaks English. This defective unit was made in China and not in Delaware as advertised. The ONLY good thing I can say about this device is that because the device was unusable, I didn't have to clean up a mess that other reviewers complain about.
customer_reviews.author: T Robertson

customer_reviews.title: quite satisfied - the interchangable plates are very crucial and make ...
customer_reviews.text: quite satisfied - the interchangable plates are very crucial and make your life easy - i did not like that the waffle liquid spilled over the back side and went through the device - there is no protection to avoid this when the waffle liquid may expand more than expected which is very common
customer_reviews.author: manos protonotarios

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable product. Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading all the negative reviews first. I use this almost everyday of the week with the various plates. It's been two years now, many of the critical parts broke and now it’s not very useful and borderline unsafe. First to go was the top latch. That cracked very early on. The plastic clips that hold down the plates chipped or the springs failed later. Now the plates won’t stay in place because the plate hold-downs are also bent or broken off. It’s priced right for the quality, cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Chi H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason that I did not give 5 stars is because the clean up. The cooking stuff gets into all the cracks and hiles of machine and they dont make it easy to clean out. Need to come up with a better way to more of a "guard" against the back where all the hardware is, so it does not get into those holes. But knowing that is an issue, it still would not prevent me from buying it. It works great, we use it all the time, and we love it! Love using the sandwich one and filling it with all kinds of yummy stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tkgriff

customer_reviews.title: Not the Greatest
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok. The price is too high for the product features. There is no on and off switch, no real instruction. A small recipe booklet included, but none of the recipes related to the product. My first batch of waffled were crisp and brown on the bottom, but not so brown on top. It does do sandwiches good, but not great. I wouldn't recommend to a friend. Not my favorite appliance. I have only used a few times, so I am giving it the benefit of no instruction and operating on a trial by trial use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rook

customer_reviews.title: but my wife loves the easy clean up (our previous unit did not have removable ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the waffle plates, but my wife loves the easy clean up (our previous unit did not have removable plates) We have not tried the other plates as of yet, but I am sure they will work well. It does show the waffle is done before it is actually done (crisp) but we can get used to that. And I wish the cord were about 6" longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Love that the plates come out for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Love that the plates come out for easy cleanup and that I don't have to have more bulky cookers like a waffle maker too. Saves space in my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this didn't get a five-star rating is that, after only about 3 weeks of usage, the latch holding the cover closed snapped off already. Otherwise, we are loving this. My family has been asking for a waffle maker for months - we've used this not only for waffles but for omelettes, "hot pocket" type sandwiches, and quesadillas. We've collected a whole list of creative waffle recipes, for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and are gradually working through all of them. I'd definitely recommend this unit but be gentle with that latch!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy F - Akron, NY

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful! More than worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of equipment! It makes incredible sandwiches. Grilled cheese sandwiches are done Perfectly! Clean up is almost nonexistent. Simple to use 1 insert plates wanted 2 plug in 3 wait until it says ready 4 put sandwiches on grill close and lock, 5 open when it says done, put on plates and enjoy! We love the ease, speed and convenience + the finished product. The only thing I would change is a metal lock instead of plastic one which could break.
customer_reviews.author: Snowgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Waffle plates don’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Started out using this iron for omelettes and sandwiches. When I tried to first use the waffle plates, I noted the finish was much shinier. I didn’t think anything of it until I tried to snap the plates into the appliance and realized the tabs were not the right spacing. They would not lock in and were therefore unusable. Getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: easternshore

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but a lot of soot on the underside of the plates
customer_reviews.text: Like the versatility of the product. Purchased it 6 months ago. So far we have used only the omelette and the sandwich plates. Product works as advertised but the underside of the omelette plate has a lot of soot. Makes using it very messy. It does not seem to come off despite repeated washes. Very annoying since this is the set we use most often. Not as much soot on the other set of plates. The plates itself seem to be of average quality, but it has lasted so far
customer_reviews.author: TBD

customer_reviews.title: Have to be gentle and its great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is poor but I am ok with that, so you have to be gentle, but other than that its great! I mainly got this so I can make waffles and sandwiches and its doing its job terrifically! Just BEWARE not to over pour your waffle batter because it can get inside the machine since the edges are not water/liquid proof. Just make test batch to see how much batter you should use and this thing will make great waffles! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Great product and honest company
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Excellent customer service ( I contacted the company (Z&Z Inc.) and they responded to my question immediately and helped me solve the small problem I had. Z&Z Inc. is very professional. The product arrived quickly as well. We love our hot sandwiches, it is very easy to operate even for my 12 year old. Good company that can be trusted & that cares for it’s customers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check all the plates before using.
customer_reviews.text: The waffle plate doesn't even line up and keeps falling out from the top because the tabs aren't where they are supposed to be to lock the plate in place. Bought for the kiddos and husband to use and too dangerous with the waffle plates. The other plates line up but that specific plate is what I wanted for the kiddos. We will see how everything else works. Plus I can't return it as my window expired... upset for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cm

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really nice interchangeable plates for different food preparations but very poor lock. We bought 3 of them and all of them already have broken lock on ha for so we have to hold it down while it cooks
customer_reviews.author: V_S

customer_reviews.title: Plates do stay in. They fall out while cooking!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I received! The first on the plates wouldn't stay in place! Needless to say epic disaster when you maleng breakfast. They sent me a replacement, same thing. This is not worth it. All you'll do is get pussed and burn your self trying to make waffles. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it has a very small surface area. The waffles where smaller then Eggo’s, and sandwiches got squashed. More design for one person eating. College student kind of thing
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The lid melted and the plates don’t fit. I bought this for my new home and didn’t get to try it until now. The return window has closed and I’m stuck with this.. spend a few extra bucks for something better
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Great waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little appliance! I'm using this at least once a week. The sandwich piece and we really the waffles that I make on this grill! It's so quick and easy to use. The only one I haven't tried yet is the one they say can make omelets, but I'm looking forward to trying it soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie R.

customer_reviews.title: There are too many places where one can spill over ...
customer_reviews.text: There are too many places where one can spill over and no way to clean them up, i know that one is supposed to put only the correct amount, but in the kitchen there are always spill overs and this does NOT give you an option to be able to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! easy to use, ...But
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen appliance i bought in a long time. Even my 8 year old can use it safely. Comes in handy on the weekends or during the summer when we practically live on grilled cheese and the like. I wish it had more precise temp controls, but we figured out the cooking times intuitively pretty quickly. Most things require more than one cycle of the indicator light being "done". The looking clip broke pretty early on, but was easily replaced with a small strong bag clip. The convenience and ease of use make up for these shortcomings in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Beineke

customer_reviews.title: It made the best Belgium waffles
customer_reviews.text: I took the grill camping. It made the best Belgium waffles. Also made omelettes that turned out well. The small size works well for saving space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The first waffle iron had defects. The replacement was ordered and delivered quickly. This is a great and easy to use. It was trial and error on amount of waffle mix to put on without overfilling. Made great waffles. This will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is so convenient. We've used this for virtually every single meal since we got it. Since the plates come out, cleanup is super fast and easy. It is a cheaper product, and some features such as temperature control or a buzzing timer would be nice. The light goes off and on when food is "ready" acting like a timer, but most times the food isn't completely cooked, especially with the omelettes. But for the price, we are thrilled with this!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little versatile machine. Makes great waffles, and sandwiches. Changing out the plates is super easy. Clean up is a breeze. Def recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JLT1997

customer_reviews.title: Firstly the instructions were horrible. Could not figure out when the unit was ...
customer_reviews.text: The item did not really work out as I expected it would. Firstly the instructions were horrible. Could not figure out when the unit was heating or ready. The item did not have a setting to control the duration when the cooking was done. The plates felt cheap. The quality of the item looks like its going to break after a few uses. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ArkAngel

customer_reviews.title: waffle/sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: this product does not work very well, i love the idea of having 4 interchangeable trays that are removable and dishwasher safe, however it does not heat well. Waffles should take under 5 minutes, it took 30. I am sending mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, the indicator lights help a lot. Only made waffles so far, but they turned out perfect. Very happy with product. Directions were a bit confusing, and the recipe book that came with it made no sense as it held regular recipes not for the unit at all. But I have a different recipe book to work from so no problems at all. Love that the plates are dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: JLLambert

customer_reviews.title: Grand sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: Sandwich maker plates are lighter than expected but are working very good. It really helps that the plates are removable for cleaning and for varying uses. The kids use the omelette and sandwich plates everyday and have had very little mess. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: The plastic closing latch should be made out of a more stronger material.
customer_reviews.text: I love this and how it comes with 4 plates. It works great! I was making waffles and pancakes weekly and the only thing that went wrong was the plastic closing latch broke off when I went to lock it. I don't imagine you'd replace it?
customer_reviews.author: Jean's ponies

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but expect a possible long wait lol
customer_reviews.text: So far, am very happy with the product. Only annoying problem was the wait. Expect to see the words "order received" for awhile, before product is finally shipped unexpectedly lol. Otherwise, for the price, and it's many uses, it's well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Charles Homiston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with cheap quality. No instructions were included with the waffle maker. There is no temperature control. The unit turns on when it is plugged in and heats up to a very high heat, making it difficult to determine the length of time required to cook an item. It turns off when the plug is pulled. I do like the fact that it has four, interchangeable, non-stick cooking plates, which can be used for waffles, omelettes, panini or grilling. The plates are removable, which make them easy to clean. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat2u

customer_reviews.title: sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: love the price and that it comes with so many other thing to make all in one
customer_reviews.author: Delores

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing to make omelettes. Doing they turn out best if unit is flipped over after a minute and a half for another minute and a half. Be sure and place on an oven mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff kruse

customer_reviews.title: I threw it away and purchased another grill. I love my other grill
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to use without having a mess to clean. Can't make waffles without exact batter measuring, unless you like to take the unit apart and clean all the leaked batter for the inside. The cheese on a cheese sandwich had to be an exact match to the bread, or another cleaning mess was created. I couldn't even feel good about giving it away. I didn't want anyone in the world to have the problems. I had. I'm happy I threw my bad purchase away.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Martin

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: crappy. the plates dont fit and youve not replied to my request for replacements
customer_reviews.author: VanAa

customer_reviews.title: Simple and versatile counter top cooking
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have all the features of more expensive models but the multiple cooking surfaces are easy to clean and replace when you get the hang of removing them, just wait till they cool off. Waffles, panini, omelettes, you name it and you can cook it
customer_reviews.author: Jon marc weston

customer_reviews.title: wonderful machine
customer_reviews.text: we love this machine. We have made sandwiches, omelets, and waffles. It is quick to heat up; easy to use; easy to clean. It doesn't get much better when it comes to kitchen appliances. I wish I had one of these when I was in college.
customer_reviews.author: K. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this. 4 in 1 pack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. 4 in 1 pack, makes it so much easy. And detachable plates mean i can finally clean my sandwich maker.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great but latch broke after just a couple uses. Would probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: James young

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Great for younger cooks and messy cooks.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé purchased this breakfast maker about a week ago and this thing is awesome. I personally don't like gadgets when I have a perfectly good stove but I now prefer using this. I've made fluffy omelets, over easy-hard scramble eggs, and tons of sandwiches. This is way easier to just plug in, throw everything on and let it cook without flipping it and the cheese always melts in the middle without burning the outside. It's really cut down on my cleaning time since me fiancé doesn't have to get out 2-3 pans to make breakfast/lunch. I really recommend this thing for the younger cooks and the messy cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but I grilled hamburgers in it and they came out fast and good. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Recieved Incorrect parts
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to use this product especially for the waffle maker however when I received this product the waffle plates appeared to not belong to this machine. They were not secured and would fall off. A huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Patricio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap. Takes a while to heat up and then takes a while to toast.
customer_reviews.author: TM's two cents

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The different pieces are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The different pieces are easy to use. The only downfall for me is trying to clean the whole unit...it's difficult to get in all the creases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapo town USA.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the variety in plates but the whole thing sucks and usually makes a giant mess. I gave mine away.
customer_reviews.author: Ostrich Angst

customer_reviews.title: All right, does what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: The problem as other reviewers have noted is that food gets stuck where the panels snap in and can lead to a long cleanup since the space around that area is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it much, keep forgetting I have it, but the waffles I did make where perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not heating
customer_reviews.text: My device worked fir the first time only. Then, when I try to turn it on the red light shine without giving any heat even for 20 minutes. Bad manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Alshehhi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying using my S6141A-B Sandwich Maker/Waffle Maker. We love waffles for breakfast but it was so much trouble to clean up my waffle iron afterwards. Now all I have to do is remove the plates, put them in the dishwasher and I'm done. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: top of lid is melting while cooking
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this waffle maker 2 times the second time I used it the top of cover or plastic started to bubble and melt. I will have to return it. I don't feel this product is safe
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Too good
customer_reviews.text: Too good. Used it for sandwich today and the dish came out very well. The beauty of this product is the ease of cleaning. Definitely would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: My Husband LOVES this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We use it everyday and its perfect for our omelets/sandwiches! Only downside is that the little handle broke easily and we are waiting to see if it will be back in stock to reorder since I don't think they sell parts separately. Other than that its been great!!
customer_reviews.author: WAFFLELOVER

customer_reviews.title: Useful & Quick
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sandwich maker. We have been using it every day to make hot pocket sandwiches and can't wait to use it for other recipes. Great for a college student for their dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for hubby. Now I get waffles in bed every morning. This is so easy to clean and I only know that because HE cleans it which means it must be! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Cestodio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - we've used the waffle plates and sandwich plates. I LOVE the removable plates for easy cleaning. It does smell like plastic the first time you use it, as others have mentioned, but it does go away and does not affect the taste. For the price and multiple plate options, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. Didn't find it too messy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Didn't find it too messy to clean up as others said. Actually has been easier than previous product we had.
customer_reviews.author: CraigB

customer_reviews.title: Compact!
customer_reviews.text: Works for me!!! I love it! Made cooking easy for me!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerLuvr

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The waffle plates do not fit and line up to hold in place. I will return it. Or can I get other waffle plates? I had a problem & I cannot say enough about the great customer service, the problem was solved.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hower

customer_reviews.title: particularly like the removable plates which makes cleaner easier
customer_reviews.text: other than strangely worded instructions and recipes, the sandwich maker works well. particularly like the removable plates which makes cleaner easier. made an omelette and waffles to test it and the result was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Savitt

customer_reviews.title: ... enough to store in my small kitchen and is easy to put the grill for the non-cookers in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is small enough to store in my small kitchen and is easy to put the grill for the non-cookers in the house to make their own grilled sandwiches.I have not had the opportunity to use the waffle grill yet though.
customer_reviews.author: eae225

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and came with all of the attachments. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Is so much more then expected and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael brock

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: First use. The item workd one minute and no more. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: klimand yossi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Easy to use and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Keller

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this product. It does what I need it to do, making the omelets I want. Thanks Z&Z.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Love this stylish little "kitchen helper"
customer_reviews.text: Love this stylish little "kitchen helper". Got two more for my friends for Christmas as the loved our quick and easy breakfasts. Easy to use and clean,doesn't take much space on the kitchen counter,very convenient for college students too. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Fridman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gadget! Waffles came out great! Excited to experiment and make some fun sandwiches for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Mommajess

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for two months now and it works great. I use it to cook my eggs in. Everytime the eggs cook fast and come out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CDG

customer_reviews.title: ... I first bought a sandwich maker it worked really beautifully. The handle the Click thing broke and now ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought a sandwich maker it worked really beautifully. The handle the Click thing broke and now it doesn't close. I even emailed the company and I got no response
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but broke the first time using
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, but broke the first time using. I'm careful with my products. I contacted Amazon next day they took care of everything. I live to far from a City to pop down purchase things. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Annabel E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Ordering and shipping was great as usual. Very disappointed with this product. Made waffles yesterday and the batter leaked down into the unit underneath the pan under the heating element. Without being able to get it clean it is unusable because it is unsanitary and is a potential fire hazard. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: We love the sandwich maker! It is very easy to use and makes great PANINIS!!! I haven't used the waffle maker yet, but I'm looking forward to trying it out. The company offers excellent communication and service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamela Crickenberger

customer_reviews.title: I want you to send the parts again.
customer_reviews.text: I received a main body and a pair of breakfast and sandwich pan.But there was only one waffle and omelet pan. I can't use them. I do not want to return the item. I just want you to send me again one waffle pan and one omelet pan.
customer_reviews.author: Young153

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Interchangeable plates are kind of thin. Does not heat evenly. Ok product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Much faster heating and cooking than similar products I've had. Easy to clean because the cooking plates can be removed. I'm going to buy a second one to use in my RV!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Truax

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping process
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping process. Arrived very quickly, item is exactly as pictured and described. The interchangeable plates are lighter than I have had with similar products, but work just great! Great product for the right price!
customer_reviews.author: lisa w.

customer_reviews.title: So very very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find one of these for some time. I love it!!!! Everyone in the house has used it for different things and I have yet to hear any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda

customer_reviews.title: I need the plates that fit in here.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the only plate that fits is the sandwich plate the other plates dont fit at all My son Is so disappointed, he wants to make waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made great waffles and removable plates are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Made great waffles and removable plates are easy to clean. I only wish that the machine itself was easier to clean when the batter spills over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Raysin

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Just over a month of owning and using it about 5 times and it broke. Spend the money and get a better quality product. This isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4-in-1 sandwich maker... love it
customer_reviews.text: The sandwich maker arrived on time. The quality is very good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, works perfect with every plate. We use it alot for waffles and it cooks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: I like how the trays are detachable. They are easy to clean,
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: there you can see that the waffle maker is very different from the sandwich! very very disappointed I'm returning it back
customer_reviews.author: Jezuza Malguy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month of use
customer_reviews.text: We used this iron for about a month as the locking mechanism broke. It is a plastic piece which appears to be not durable enough for regular kitchen use. I had to return the item, luckily got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because we boycott the frozen waffle company. I compaed and read all the reviews on Amazon, I decide to give this a try. I use some other silmilar products before, so this is very easy for me. It is easy to use. I make the waffle the first time, it turns out perfect. I want to make pannini next. I will give a update later.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Originally got this for the omlet plate but have used every single plate. My family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: They were great. Can't wait to use the other plates
customer_reviews.text: Just got around to using this last night. Had waffles on a cold snowy night. They were great. Can't wait to use the other plates.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kepler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great we love it, but it does make a mess when making waffles
customer_reviews.author: joseph greer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 months ago. She's happy with it. Therefore I'm happy with it! LOL Works great.
customer_reviews.author: OCD Moving

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got for family member that love it. ( would recommend to a friend.)
customer_reviews.author: Theo S

customer_reviews.title: Instructions written in very poor English. Glad I could
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to try all accessories. Instructions written in very poor English. Glad I could decipher
customer_reviews.author: S. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! I love the interchangeable plates
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I love the interchangeable plates, they are very easy to clean and change out! Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Plates don’t fit and can’t use so have to return
customer_reviews.text: The plates they sent with it don’t fit on machine. It will be returned. Impossible to use. Total waste of my time and money
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this product right out of the box to make waffles and I love it! The plates are really light weight. I have used all the plates and they all work great. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis34

product_meta.title: ZZ S6141A-B Breakfast Sandwich Maker with Sets of Detachable Non-stick Plate
feature_bullets: 4 Sets of Detachable Heating Plates; Cook delicious breakfast, sandwich, waffle and omelette quickly at home
Removable non-stick plate surface for easy-clean-up; Dishwasher safe
Power on and pre-heat light remind you the perfect temperature for cooking
Store vertically and cord-wrap for more compact storage; Easy-open cool touch handle with lock
Cooking Surface Dimension: L: 8-4/5; W: 5-1/10 Inch
